title: Which is the best university for engineering, Nagpur or Amravati? - Quora

response.answer_text: For engineering Amravati university is good as compare to Nagpur. Nagpur university is black listed because they are having a case of fraud degrees. And also Amravati is good in ranking as compare to Nagpur. But Amravati university is taking too much time to display results and some time they are not releasing the revaluation result. Some good collage in Amravati. Gov Coll of engineering Amravati Sant Gajanan baba college of engg Shegaon. Ram Megha college of engg Amravati Raisoni college of engineering Amravati. HVPM college of engineering P R Pote college of engineering.

If you're asking from these two , then Amravati University is the best because it's the highly rated & popular after pune University and Govt. College of Amravati is one of the top most college. These are the ranking wise list of Amravati colleges :- Govt. College of AmravatiRam meghe college (old)Ram meghe college (new)Sipna college of engineeringRaisoni college of engineering.IBSS college of engineering.But if you are thinking to take admission in autonomous college then Nagpur have 3 top college Ramdevbaba college of engineeringYCCERaisoni college of engineering.And Nagpur University is degraded due to the cheating & that can also affect while applying for job.
